src:
10 Menit yang Mengerikan, Frank Lampard Kritik Penampilan Chelsea
03 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard masih sedikit kecewa dengan penampilan skuad Chelsea meski berhasil mengalahkan Watford 2-1, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Dia mencemaskan kecerobohan timnya di menit akhir pertandingan.
The Blues sempat unggul 2-0 dengan nyaman dan mendominasi permainan, Watford tak berdaya. Namun, situasi itu berubah drastis pada 10 menit terakhir pertandingan.
Berawal dari keputusan VAR yang kontroversial, Gerard Deulofeu bisa mencetak gol balasan dari titik putih di menit ke-80. Setelah itu, Watford tampil kian bersemangat dan berusaha mengejar gol berikutnya.
Chelsea benar-benar kerepotan pada 10 menit terakhir ini. Kepa Arrizabalaga harus membuat sejumlah penyelamatan gemilang.
Situasi itulah yang dikeluhkan Lampard. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
10 Horrifying Minutes, Frank Lampard Criticizes Chelsea's Appearance
Nov 03 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Frank Lampard is still a little disappointed with the appearance of the Chelsea squad despite defeating Watford 2-1, Sunday (11/03/2019) early morning hrs. He worried about his team's carelessness in the final minutes of the match.
The Blues had a comfortable 2-0 lead and dominated the game, Watford was helpless. However, the situation changed dramatically in the last 10 minutes of the match.
Starting from a controversial VAR decision, Gerard Deulofeu was able to score a goal back from the spot in the 80th minute. After that, Watford appeared increasingly excited and tried to pursue the next goal.
Chelsea really hassles in the last 10 minutes. To Arrizabalaga he had to make a number of glorious rescues.
That situation is what Lampard complained about. Read below, Bolaneters!
